metadata.title: USN-4075-1 -- Exim vulnerability
metadata.description: Jeremy Harris discovered that Exim incorrectly handled sort expansions. In environments where sort expansions are used, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code as root.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4075-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  exim4-dev - 4.86.2-2ubuntu2.4 eximon4 - 4.86.2-2ubuntu2.4 exim4 - 4.86.2-2ubuntu2.4 exim4-base - 4.86.2-2ubuntu2.4 exim4-config - 4.86.2-2ubuntu2.4 exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.86.2-2ubuntu2.4 exim4-daemon-light - 4.86.2-2ubuntu2.4 No subscription required
